reasoning: Degenerative polyarthritis refers to osteoarthritis affecting multiple joints. Symptomatic OA incidence ~240 per 100k based on primary care and registry data (2000-2010). Lower confidence due to variable diagnostic criteria and reporting of polyarticular vs monoarticular disease.
source: Oliveria SA et al. (1995). Incidence of symptomatic hand, hip, and knee osteoarthritis among patients in a health maintenance organization. Arthritis Rheum. 38(8):1134-41
